name: SPACE BUFFALO GENOCIDE
description:
Do you like westerns? Do you like sci-fi? Do you like blowing up defenseless animals? If you answered no to any of the following... PLAY OUR GAME ANYWAYS!

Play as a cowboy in the large confines of space, who was peacefully traveling through until a herd of wild space buffalo came storming through! With no options left, the mighty cowboy straps his trusty laser gun to his cart and must blast his way through! Yeehaw! Do whatever it takes to save your precious pig, Princess, and yourself!

This game was made in less than 72 hours as a challenge to myself, and to relearn what years of procrastination took away from me. This game is a simple project to get myself back into the swing of things, and I hope to produce more quality content in the future!

This game is a simple arcade shooter, where the goal is to get the highest score you can! Programming was done by me, art is done by Elizabeth (@cerfuffle_of_kontent on Instagram). We hope you enjoy this project!
